thread.section_title: Home Zone Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Home Zone Furniture | homezonefurniture.com | 7 of 152
thread.title: Kenneth
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Kenneth

author: Kenneth
title: Kenneth
text:
Our salesperson Katie, knew every answer to our questions right off the top of her head and she was 100% accurate on all information given. Warehouse was short handed and it was really awesome how the rest of the sales crew and management all jumped to action. I one person in the warehouse was amazing. He meticulously opened 9k worth of furniture and inspected it with us. They even let us borrow a furniture dolly which we returned.
Thanks homezpne for a great product and experience
